content:
Hi all, It seems that everybody is in isolation in someways.
@Sean could you give info for New Cross-Platform 3D Display Manager (QT+Ogre) ? Are there any progress or assigned to someone ?

Physical isolation, not digitally though! I've been having a crazy number of interactions daily now between phone conference calls, daily messages from school and work, video from every one of my kids' teachers, daily video chat with just about everyone, and that's not even getting to the avalanche of e-mails and chat now that everyone's online. :)

@scorp08 That project is not currently assigned, but there has been some decent progress. We have no fewer than four prototype Qt interfaces, there's an interactive raytracing potential Display Manager, there's complete mock-ups.
